name: Arena of the Mad King (AotMK)
description:
Arena of the Mad King (AotMK) is an arcade bullet-hell boss battle game inspired by Realm of the Mad God and Touhou Project.

The Mad King is subjecting the peasants to the horrors of the arena. Will you survive and put an end to his tyranny?

Controls:

Mouse: Shoot
WASD: Move
Shift: Slow

QE: Rotate
C: Toggle Center

O: Swap Character Sprite
P: Toggle Light & TV FX
Esc: Quit Game

Requirements:

Shader Model 4.5 or newer (older GPUs may not work). Game should run smoothly on low-end, modern GPUs.
